tidychangepoint 0.0.1

    Climate data in tidychangepoint Using Coen's algorithm
  • Changelog

    Extract changepoints

    changepoints.Rd

    Not to be confused with wbs::changepoints(), which returns different information.

    Usage

    # S3 method for mod_cpt
changepoints(x, ...)

# S3 method for seg_basket
changepoints(x, ...)

# S3 method for seg_cpt
changepoints(x, ...)

# S3 method for tidycpt
changepoints(x, use_labels = FALSE, ...)

changepoints(x, ...)

# S3 method for default
changepoints(x, ...)

seg_params(x, ...)

# S3 method for ga
changepoints(x, ...)

# S3 method for cpt
changepoints(x, ...)

# S3 method for wbs
changepoints(x, ...)

    Arguments

    x

    A tidycpt object

    ...

    arguments passed to methods

    use_labels

    return the time labels for the changepoints instead of the indices.

    See also

    wbs::changepoints()

    Other tidychangepoint-generics: diagnose.mod_cpt(), exceedances(), fitness.seg_basket()

    Other tidychangepoint-generics: diagnose.mod_cpt(), exceedances(), fitness.seg_basket()

    Examples

    cpts <- segment(DataCPSim, method = "ga", maxiter = 5)
changepoints(cpts$segmenter)

cpts <- segment(DataCPSim, method = "wbs")
changepoints(cpts$segmenter)
#>  [1]  547  822  939  972  981  982  997  999 1031 1032 1040 1041 1063 1066
